title: On the singularities of the exponential function of a semidirect product
authors: Rafael Dahmen, Karl-Hermann Neeb, Alexander Schmeding
abstract:
In this short note we discuss the existence of singular points for the
exponential function of a semidirect product Lie group close to $0$. As an
application, we prove that the Bondi-Metzner-Sachs group of symmetries of an
asymptotically flat spacetime is not locally exponential.
